name: Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml (Pack of 2)
summary: Achieve glass-like skin with the Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash, enriched with rice water and niacinamide to gently cleanse and hydrate your skin. Available in a 150 ml pack of two, it promises a radiant and refreshed complexion.

name: Rice Facial Kit With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 60 g
description: Salon-Like Glow in 6 Steps | Improves Skin Texture
summary: Achieve a salon-like glow with our Rice Facial Kit, featuring rice water and niacinamide to enhance skin texture and deliver glass-like skin in just six steps.

name: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti & Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control & Acne - 100 ml
summary: Revitalize your skin with the Multani Mitti Face Wash, infused with Multani Mitti and Bulgarian Rose to control oil, reduce acne, and enhance hydration. Perfect for achieving a balanced, refreshed complexion.

name: Rice Water Dewy Face Toner with 96% Pure Rice Water Extract & 4% Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml

summary: Achieve a dewy, glass-like glow with this Rice Water Dewy Face Toner, featuring 96% pure rice water extract and 4% niacinamide to intensely hydrate, minimize pores, and even out skin tone.
